long_description: The small Mountainsmith Camera Lens Case 2 complements your trail-ready camera ensemble and helps shield your camera lens from dust and impact. Interior features 2 padded spacers; zippered access features a dust guard to help seal out grit. Hypalon(TM) reinforced attachment points stand up to the rigors of your outdoor adventures. Dual-density foam lining helps cushion your lens from bumps and drops. Mesh pocket under the lid holds small accessories. The Mountainsmith Camera Lens Case 2 features a detachable shoulder strap with snap-hook attachments.
short_description: The small Mountainsmith Camera Lens Case 2 complements your trail-ready camera ensemble and helps shield your camera lens from dust and impact.
